options.name: Fledgling Marksman
options.description: You have trained with several types of ranged weapons. Gain +1 skill with simple and complex ranged weapons.

options.name: Action : Aimed Shot
options.description: While making an attack with a simple or complex ranged weapon, roll an additional attack dice.

options.name: Action : Headshot
options.description: While making an attack with a simple or complex ranged weapon, roll one less dice but the damage on your primary attack dice is doubled.

options.name: Improved Aim
options.description: Your aiming is greatly improved, allowing you not suffer a penalty while shooting at one range greater than your optimal range.

options.name: Ammocraft
options.description: You are skilled at making your own ammunition. Gain +1 skill with engineering. When crafting ammunition or ranged weapons, roll an additional dice.

options.name: Focused
options.description: Marksman require a centered mind to achieve their potential. Gain +1 skill with concentration and coordination.

options.name: Skilled Marksman
options.description: You have trained with several types of ranged weapons. Gain +1 skill with simple and complex ranged weapons.

options.name: Savage Shots
options.description: When all of your dice hit when making an attack with a simple or complex ranged weapon, deal extra damage equal to your weapon damage.

options.name: Stance of the Marksman
options.description: You gain the Marksman Stance, allowing you to utilize your concentration to improve your accuracy.

options.name: Talented Marksman
options.description: Your relentless training has resulted in +1 talent with simple and complex ranged weapons.
